rules.text: Projects must reforest lands without forest cover since 31 December 1989 and comply with national definitions.
rules.title: Projects must reforest lands without forest cover since 31 December 1989 and comply with national definitions.
when: Project lands classified as non-forest for at least 10 years prior to start date.
Title documents demonstrate right to implement A/R activities.

rules.text: Baseline biomass is determined using IPCC default factors or site-specific sampling following Tool 02 guidance.
rules.title: Baseline biomass is determined using IPCC default factors or site-specific sampling following Tool 02 guidance.
when: IPCC Tier 2 defaults are justified in monitoring report.

rules.text: Net anthropogenic GHG removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.
rules.title: Net anthropogenic GHG removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.
when: All carbon pools accounted for unless exclusion justified.
Leakage deduction applied before reporting net removal.

rules.text: Activity shifting leakage is quantified using Tool 14 and discounted from net removals.
rules.title: Activity shifting leakage is quantified using Tool 14 and discounted from net removals.
when: Community livelihoods impacted by land-use change.
Leakage mitigation plan implemented with monitoring indicators.

rules.text: Non-permanence risk must be addressed through buffer contributions consistent with Tool 15 guidance.
rules.title: Non-permanence risk must be addressed through buffer contributions consistent with Tool 15 guidance.
when: Non-permanence risk assessment completed prior to credit issuance.
Buffer contributions recorded in registry records.

rules.text: Field measurements of biomass stock changes occur at least every five years with permanent plots.
rules.title: Field measurements of biomass stock changes occur at least every five years with permanent plots.
when: Permanent sample plots accessible throughout crediting period.

rules.text: If sampling uncertainty exceeds 10%, apply Tool 12 to derive conservative estimates.
rules.title: If sampling uncertainty exceeds 10%, apply Tool 12 to derive conservative estimates.

rules.text: Monitoring reports include maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.
rules.title: Monitoring reports include maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.
when: Reporting aligns with UNFCCC template requirements.
All supporting datasets archived with version history.
